attributes.action: ensure that the number of people listed as asking him to resign is updated and accurate
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: a recent petition asking the Prime Minister to resign gathered pace over a period of 10 days to appox  58000 then suddenly stopped. the number has remained the same for about 2 weeks which is rediculous. if you are to offer this service to British citizens then you should be honest and prepared for the down side as well as the good.

rejection.details: Your information regarding this petition is incorrect. Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
